Explanation: A use statement lets you use a type of Object in your program. In this case, you are using the BarChart object.
A variable declaration that makes a new BarChart. You can use the assignment operator on bar chart with a DataFrame
A variable declaration that makes a new box plot.
Selects a column factor from the CSV file into the DataFrame (can be non-numerical values)
Creates a bar chart with the selected factors and columns
Creates a BoxPlot on the selected factors and columns.
Sets the title of the bar chart
Sets the y axis of the bar chart
Sets the x axis of the bar chart
